detail_desc: Satin-covered Alice band with a decorative, glittery witch’s hat, velour ribbon and colourful hair extensions.
Long-sleeved hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from cotton and recycled polyester. Jersey-lined, drawstring hood, long raglan sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from cotton and recycled polyester. Jersey-lined, drawstring hood, long raglan sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from cotton and recycled polyester. Jersey-lined, drawstring hood, long raglan sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Short, empire-line dress in woven fabric with a square neckline front and back and short puff sleeves with elastication and a small frill trim around the shoulders and at the hems. Gathered tier on the skirt for added width. Lined at the top.

Cropped, boxy top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a V-neck, low dropped shoulder seams and long, wide sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.

Cropped, boxy top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a V-neck, low dropped shoulder seams and long, wide sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Four metal hair clips, two with a hammered finish.
Shorter top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front, a round neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Shorter top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front, a round neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Shorter top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front, a round neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
5-pocket trousers in washed, stretch cotton twill. Classic fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight legs.
5-pocket trousers in washed, stretch cotton twill. Classic fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight legs.

Set with a top and pair of trousers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1-4Y), long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems. Lightly brushed inside.
Shoulder bag in soft faux fur with a metal chain and imitation leather shoulder strap. Flap with a metal snap lock, and one inner compartment. Satin lining made from recycled polyester.
Shoulder bag in soft faux fur with a metal chain and imitation leather shoulder strap. Flap with a metal snap lock, and one inner compartment. Satin lining made from recycled polyester.

Fancy dress body in velour with a sweetheart neckline, glittery hearts at the front and frills with a contrasting colour trim at the top and cuffs. Sewn-on pleated skirt in velour that is open at the front. Concealed zip at the back.
Oversized, sleeveless, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, flap front pockets, and a single back vent. Lined. The polyester content of the jacket is recycled.
Leggings in heavy jersey with flatlock seams. High waist with covered elastication.
Leggings in heavy jersey with flatlock seams. High waist with covered elastication.
Calf-length kaftan in an airy viscose weave with a small, gathered stand-up collar and a V-shaped opening at the top. Concealed buttons down the front and short sleeves.

Shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide, elasticated ribbing at the waist. The shorts are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a small embroidered text motif on the front and a round, rib-trimmed neckline.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a small embroidered text motif on the front and a round, rib-trimmed neckline.

Short dress in a cotton weave with a square neckline. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication over the shoulders and at the hems. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt with gathered tiers. Unlined.

Short dress in a cotton weave with a square neckline. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication over the shoulders and at the hems. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt with gathered tiers. Unlined.
Loose-fitting jumper in a soft cable knit with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Gently rounded and slightly longer at the back.

Studio Collection. Fitted jacket in a slightly stretchy weave made from a wool blend with peak lapels and a one-button fastening at the front. Shoulder pads for a defined silhouette and long sleeves with buttons at the cuffs. Patch front pockets, one of which is a chest pocket, a gently tapered waist and a double back vent. Lined. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.

Studio Collection. Slim-fit trousers in a stretch weave made from a wool blend with a regular waist, belt loops and a tailored waistband with a safety button on the inside. Zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and slim, extra-long legs with a high slit and buttons at the hems. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.
Foot jewellery in metal chain with a fixed, adjustable toe ring, a chain with decorative beads along the top of the foot and an adjustable ankle chain.
Blouse in an airy weave with a deep V-neck, double-layered panel at the front and gathered yoke at the back. Long sleeves, wide cuffs with covered buttons, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Blouse in an airy weave with a deep V-neck, double-layered panel at the front and gathered yoke at the back. Long sleeves, wide cuffs with covered buttons, and a rounded hem. Unlined.

Short, A-line dress in a pleated weave made partly from recycled polyester. Small frilled collar, an opening at the back with a covered button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with concealed elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Lined in fabric made partly from recycled polyester.

Baby Exclusive. Top in soft, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a narrow trim around the neckline and buttons at the back of the neck. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem.

Baby Exclusive. Top in soft, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a narrow trim around the neckline and buttons at the back of the neck. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in ribbed organic cotton jersey with an adjustable, elasticated waist and fake fly with decorative buttons.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in ribbed organic cotton jersey with an adjustable, elasticated waist and fake fly with decorative buttons.
Fully lined, smocked bikini bottoms with a high waist, high-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.
Trousers in a wool weave. High waist with elastication at the back and a concealed zip in one side. Discreet pockets in the side seams and wide, straight legs with creases down the front.

Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. High slits in the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. High slits in the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Joggers in heavy sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbed sections at the knees. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal, zipped front pockets and ribbing at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
Short, fitted dress in lace with a round neckline, concealed zip at the back and cap sleeves. Lined.

Track jacket in padded nylon with a stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Chest pocket and side pockets, all with a concealed zip, and covered elastication at the cuffs. The jacket has a THERMOLITE® T-Down EcoMade filling, which is down-like insulation that is lightweight yet provides superior warmth and breathability. The filling is made entirely from recycled PET fibre.

Track jacket in padded nylon with a stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Chest pocket and side pockets, all with a concealed zip, and covered elastication at the cuffs. The jacket has a THERMOLITE® T-Down EcoMade filling, which is down-like insulation that is lightweight yet provides superior warmth and breathability. The filling is made entirely from recycled PET fibre.
Kangol x H&M. Oversized jumper in a soft, wide rib knit containing some wool with a fuzzy finish. Round neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a large Kangol logo above the hem.
Kangol x H&M. Oversized jumper in a soft, wide rib knit containing some wool with a fuzzy finish. Round neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a large Kangol logo above the hem.

Kangol x H&M. Oversized jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a jacquard-knit Kangol kangaroo. Ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Kangol x H&M. Oversized, knee-length cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with an intarsia-knit Kangol kangaroo on the back. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and slim-fitting cuffs with ribbed trims. Rib-trimmed patch front pockets, one with the Kangol logo, and ribbing at the hem. No fasteners.
A pair of long, stylish metal earrings with hoops and rod-shaped pendants.
Long-sleeved hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Chelsea boots in shiny leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Organic cotton linings and leather insoles.
High profile Chelsea boots in imitation leather with platform soles, elastic gores in the sides and a loop front and back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles. Height of soles 6 cm.
Rings made from recycled zinc in different designs, one with inset rhinestones.
Short, fitted skirt in a stretch weave with a decorative metal chain at one side, sewn-in wrapover at the front and concealed zip and button at the back. Recycled polyester lining.

Baby Exclusive. Fine-knit all-in-one suit in soft, warming merino wool with buttons at the top, crotch and down the inside of the legs. Long raglan sleeves and long legs. Narrow ribbed trim around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Long, fine-knit polo-neck jumper in a soft viscose blend with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides.

Wide shirt that tapers at the waist to create a dramatic silhouette. Wide turn-down collar, a concealed button band, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with cuff plackets and wide, buttoned cuffs. Folded, visible seams down the sleeves and front, and a rounded hem.

Wide shirt that tapers at the waist to create a dramatic silhouette. Wide turn-down collar, a concealed button band, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with cuff plackets and wide, buttoned cuffs. Folded, visible seams down the sleeves and front, and a rounded hem.
Necklace with four metal chains in various designs, one with a round pendant. Adjustable length.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Ankle-length sweatpants in sturdy jersey with side stripes in a contrasting colour. Regular, elasticated drawstring waist, welt side pockets, a welt back pocket and tapered legs with sewn-in creases at the front.

Ankle-length sweatpants in sturdy jersey with side stripes in a contrasting colour. Regular, elasticated drawstring waist, welt side pockets, a welt back pocket and tapered legs with sewn-in creases at the front.

Ankle-length boiler suit in lightweight cotton twill with a collar and press-studs at the front. V-shaped yoke front and back, chest pockets and patch front pockets. Long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, an elasticated seam and belt with press-studs at the waist and wide, gently tapered legs.

Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif and soft brushed inside. Casual style in a relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, ribbed, elasticated, drawstring waist, low crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved, V-neck top in jersey with a wrapover top and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy. Can be worn both during pregnancy and when nursing afterwards.
Long-sleeved, V-neck top in jersey with a wrapover top and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy. Can be worn both during pregnancy and when nursing afterwards.
Short, smocked dress in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and overlocked edges. Unlined.
Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a wide, detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Knee-length dress in softly draping satin with a V-neck and narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist. Long sleeves with bead-embroidered, buttoned cuffs. Lined at the top.

Fitted, double-breasted, knee-length dress in woven fabric. Notch lapels, covered buttons at the front, and a seam with a tie belt at the waist. Thin shoulder pads for a more defined silhouette, long sleeves and a slit at the back of the hem. Lined.
Wide, sleeveless jumper in a soft, fine-knit cashmere and cotton blend with a ribbed polo neck and ribbing at the hem.

Top with a lower section in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend, yoke and sleeves in faux shearling, and contrasting colour details. Stand-up collar with a zip, gently dropped shoulders, zipped front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Baby Exclusive. Hooded cardigan knitted in a soft, fluffy wool blend with buttons down the front. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
